item.title: Jealousy Quick Look Responsive Redesign Boston Globe
item.description:
A short while ago, the Boston Globe rolled out a redesigned website. To say that it was just redesigned is an understatement, though â€“ the new entity is the result of Responsive Web Design.

So, why jealousy? I have not yet had the opportunity to work on a responsive redesign yet; REALLY jealous of all parties involved!
